attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am completely fed up with getting junk mail, cold callers at my front door and unwanted telephone calls trying to sell me various products.

I want it to be illegal for any company to contact people in these ways, unless information has been specifically requested by someone.

rejection.details:
There are similar petitions already at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bantelemarketing/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/STOP-JUNK-MAIL/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cold-callers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
